availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Martin V. Bowen (Mercer County, Kentucky, police judge)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, shoemaker and police judge. Married to Parellee Gabhart on September 22, 1859. Father of Sallie Sims. Shoemaker in Mercer County in 1860. Police judge of Mercer County in 1865.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer, District 2, p. 3. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000191863, Mercer County Marriages, p. unknown. KYR-0001-005-0100. Find A Grave, "M.V. Bowen, (March 17, 1838-July 21, 1866)," Memorial #100536842, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=100536842 (accessed June 4, 2017).
